questions.question_text:
An organization is participating in an industry benchmarking study that involves providing customer transaction records for analysis. Which of the following is the
MOST important control to ensure the privacy of customer information?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Agree with A.

choices.B: Promoting an organizational culture of risk awareness
choices.A: Assigning risk ownership to appropriate roles
choices.D: Prioritizing risk within each business unit

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the BEST way to ensure adequate resources will be allocated to manage identified risk?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Going with A.

Selected Answer: A
Correction to 'A', reason:
because when specific individuals or teams are responsible and accountable for managing identified risks, they are more likely to prioritize and allocate the necessary resources to address the risks effectively. Promoting an organizational culture of risk awareness is also important, but it may not necessarily ensure that adequate resources are allocated to manage identified risks.

Selected Answer: B
Promoting an organizational culture of risk awareness is the best way to ensure that adequate resources will be allocated to manage identified risks.

When an organization has a culture of risk awareness, all employees understand the importance of risk management, and they actively participate in identifying and managing risks. This ensures that risks are identified and addressed at all levels of the organization and that resources are allocated appropriately to manage the risks.
